price: 35. Ne vous promet-il pas qu’une fois morts et devenus poussière et ossements vous serez à nouveau sortis (de vos tombes) ?
arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ayaʿidukum annakum idhā mittum wakuntum turāban waʿiẓāman annakum mukh'rajūna
